venue.address_2: The Shoppes at Blackstone Valley Mall
venue.name: Blackstone Valley Cinema 14

item.description:
A friend of mine told me Moneyball is pretty good. We can meet in the lobby at Blackstone Valley Cinema for the 6:35 show. Let's plan to meet at around 6:15. If you need to reach me, call my cell phone at 508-981-0455.

The story: Oakland A's General Manager Billy Beane (Brad Pitt) is handicapped with the lowest salary constraint in baseball. If he ever wants to win the World Series, Billy must find a competitive advantage. Billy is about to turn baseball on its ear when he uses statistical data to analyze and place value on the players he picks for the team.

Anyone who wants to can join me for food, drink, and conversation after the movie.

group.name: The Worcester Movie Fans Meetup Group

item.name: Moneyball
